name: Pokémon Mega Power
overview: Pokémon Mega Power is a hacked version made from Pokémon. The world of Pokémon Hacking is truly big. Many makers have unlimited ideas about their dreaming world, a new world full of Pokémon and unexpected things. Each of the hacked version are worth to wait. Now, let’s welcome the version Pokémon Mega Power. There is a young professor named Neil/Tyra. From the day he/she has a dream, he/she want to make the strongest Pokémon in the world by himself/herself. Yes, only by himself/herself, but the problem here is the lacking of money. At this time, suddenly a man named Kasper appears. He says: “I would like to contribute for your project because it attracts me. In exchange, you must share your achievement with me.” After a hesitating time, Neil/Tyra agreed. Gradually, Neil/Tyra found one truth: Kasper is the leader of a secret team called “Team Delta”. A new threat has risen from now on. Neil/Tyra begins to think about whether he/she should continue to do this research or abandon it to get himself/herself with the achievement safe. What are the reasons of Kasper for needing this project? What are the plots of Team Delta? Will Neil/Tyra stand up to fight against these gangsters or run away? The answers lie within this game.
